    • Constructor Detail

      • ApiCallback

        public ApiCallback(java.lang.Object target,
           java.lang.String method)
        Constructor ApiCallback

        This constructor gets called in two situations (and you normally should not need to do that yourself):
        1) through PieceMakerApi.createCallback()
        2) to internally create error callbacks to fire piecemakerError(..)

        Parameters:
        target - The Object that has the method (that will be called upon)
        method - The name of the method to call .. note that you can only use this name once in that target object
        See Also:
        PieceMakerApi.createCallback( Object[] args )
